```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, raster, spatstat, tmap, tidyverse)
```

```{r}
acled_sf <- read_csv("data/ACLED_Myanmar.csv") %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c(
    "longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326) %>% 
  st_transform(crs= 32647)%>%
  mutate(event_date = dmy(event_date))
```

```{r}
tmap_mode('view')
acled_sf %>%
  filter(year == 2023 |
           event_type == "Political violence") %>%
  tm_shape()+
  tm_dots()
tmap_mode("plot")
  
```
